${ModID}:AbstractArcanistCard.NAME: Not Actually a Card
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sigils can only be played via discard.

${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.NAME: Resonance
${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.FLAVOR: It's like a magic boomerang, except it isn't a boomerang, it just boomerangs back to you like a boomerang.

${ModID}:StaffStrike.NAME: Staff Strike
${ModID}:StaffStrike.FLAVOR: We've lost so many wizards we have to send our apprentices to the battle field.  Some of them are only good at hitting the monsters with a stick.

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend.FLAVOR: A shield isn't as good as a spell but at least you can learn to use it faster.

${ModID}:FrostBolt.NAME: Frost Bolt
${ModID}:FrostBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:ForceBolt.NAME: Force Bolt
${ModID}:ForceBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:IceDamage.NAME: Cold
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When an enemy with Frostbite attacks they take damage equal to their Frostbite and reduce Frostbite by 1.

${ModID}:DarkDamage.NAME: Dark
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #yTemporary #yHP based on unblocked damage dealt.  Has diminishing returns.
Temporary HP is lost at the end of battle.

${ModID}:ForceDamage.NAME: Force
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Crushed enemies take more damage from attacks.

${ModID}:ScourgeType.NAME: Scourge
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Scourge is equal to the amount of #yJinx on the target.

${ModID}:AcidSpray.NAME: Acid Spray
${ModID}:AcidSpray.FLAVOR: Not one of my favored elements, but it's great for eating through defenses.

${ModID}:Miasma.NAME: Miasma
${ModID}:Miasma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:M2! Weak. NL Target deals !M! less damage with attacks this turn.
${ModID}:Miasma.FLAVOR: The victims can never say what exactly was wrong with them, only that it was a horrible feeling.

${ModID}:FrozenLance.NAME: Frozen Lance
${ModID}:FrozenLance.FLAVOR: This spell was invented by the Aqualance?  What kind of stupid name is that?

${ModID}:PhantomFist.NAME: Phantom Fist
${ModID}:PhantomFist.FLAVOR: It's like hitting them with a fist, except the fist is the size of a watermelon and made of steel.

${ModID}:VoidTendrils.NAME: Void Tendrils
${ModID}:VoidTendrils.FLAVOR: It is a fantastic spell for offense and defense but it looks evil so NOOOOOO, we shouldn't use it.

${ModID}:SoulFlame.NAME: SoulFlame
${ModID}:SoulFlame.FLAVOR: With soul flame, it isn't the body that's burning, so your ice spells still work.

${ModID}:ChaoticMind.NAME: Chaotic Mind
${ModID}:ChaoticMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, discard !M! random card to draw !M! card.

${ModID}:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
${ModID}:Barrier.FLAVOR: A great spell for when you need to defend yourself but stay mobile.

${ModID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${ModID}:Blink.FLAVOR: Quite often the best defense is simply not being there.

${ModID}:GreaterBarrier.NAME: Greater Barrier
${ModID}:GreaterBarrier.FLAVOR: Like Barrier, but with blackjack and hookers.

${ModID}:DemonSigil.NAME: Demon Sigil
${ModID}:DemonSigil.FLAVOR: The great thing about sigils is they can be prepared ahead of time, so they don't use up your mana.

${ModID}:HardSigil.NAME: Hard Sigil
${ModID}:HardSigil.FLAVOR: Sigils have the qualities of the spell stored inside, though to a lesser degree.  This shielding spell makes its sigil tough to break.

${ModID}:CursedSigil.NAME: Cursed Sigil
${ModID}:CursedSigil.FLAVOR: A proper sigil can only be activated by a trigger word spoken by its creator.  You wouldn't want a hexing sigil going off while you're carrying it, so enchant it properly.

${ModID}:BurningSigil.NAME: Burning Sigil
${ModID}:BurningSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! HP.
${ModID}:BurningSigil.FLAVOR: Our country is being overrun by these spire monsters.  Yes, I paid a price for this power, but it is a lesser price than losing this war.

${ModID}:SpiralingSigil.NAME: Spiraling Sigil
${ModID}:SpiralingSigil.DESCRIPTION: All enemies gain 1 ${ModID}:Jinx for each debuff they have.

${ModID}:ColdSigil.NAME: Cold Sigil
${ModID}:ColdSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !M! more damage for each buff you have.

${ModID}:HeavySigil.NAME: Heavy Sigil
${ModID}:HeavySigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the highest HP enemy. NL Enemy loses !M! strength.

${ModID}:BlackSigil.NAME: Black Sigil
${ModID}:BlackSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the lowest HP enemy. NL If Fatal, heal !M! HP.

${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.NAME: Crumbling Sigil
${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies take !M! !ScourgeString! damage at the start of their turns.

${ModID}:RampingSigil.NAME: Ramping Sigil
${ModID}:RampingSigil.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! ${ModID}:Sigils you play are played an extra time.

${ModID}:FlamingSigil.NAME: Flaming Sigil
${ModID}:FlamingSigil.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! [${ModID}:SoulFireIcon] damage back.

${ModID}:OverChargedSigil.NAME: Over Charged Sigil
${ModID}:OverChargedSigil.DESCRIPTION: Lose !{ModID}:M2! HP. NL Gain [E][E]. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:ScourgeBubble.NAME: Scourge Bubble
${ModID}:ScourgeBubble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !ScourgeString! damage back.

${ModID}:VengefulChanneling.NAME: Vengeful Channeling
${ModID}:VengefulChanneling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! [${ModID}:SoulFireIcon] damage back.

${ModID}:CorruptedChanneling.NAME: Corrupted Channeling
${ModID}:CorruptedChanneling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! HP at the start of its turns.

${ModID}:BrrZerk.NAME: Brr Zerk
${ModID}:BrrZerk.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked damage, apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite.
${ModID}:BrrZerk.FLAVOR: This difficult technique is not a spell, but a way to alter your spells to also freeze the target.

${ModID}:Gale.NAME: Gale
${ModID}:Gale.FLAVOR: Pushing your opponent away is a great way to get room for a stronger spell.

${ModID}:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
${ModID}:Eruption.FLAVOR: All right, shit like this is why I studied magic!

${ModID}:WellPrepared.NAME: Prepared
${ModID}:WellPrepared.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${ModID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an attack each turn, draw !M! card.
${ModID}:Momentum.FLAVOR: If you can cast spells and run at the same time, that is much better than being a sitting duck.  Don't neglect your physical training.

${ModID}:Run.NAME: Run
${ModID}:Run.FLAVOR: Not my favorite strategy, but sometimes you just gotta run like fuck.

${ModID}:ManaBlood.NAME: Mana Blood
${ModID}:ManaBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and draw !M! card.
${ModID}:ManaBlood.UPGRADE)DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|1=Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.

${ModID}:ChaoticFlurry.NAME: Chaotic Flurry
${ModID}:ChaoticFlurry.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Play the top !M! {!M!|1=card|@=cards} of your draw pile.

${ModID}:SoulFeed.NAME: Soul Feed
${ModID}:SoulFeed.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain !M! Max HP.

${ModID}:SuddenChill.NAME: Sudden Chill
${ModID}:SuddenChill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! [${ModID}:ScourgeIcon] extra damage.

${ModID}:StoneDaggers.NAME: Stone Daggers
${ModID}:StoneDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the enemy.

${ModID}:PhantomMace.NAME: Phantom Mace
${ModID}:PhantomMace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:RipplingShadows.NAME: Rippling Shadows
${ModID}:RipplingShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Shadowcloak. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:Concentrate.NAME: Concentrate
${ModID}:Concentrate.DESCRIPTION: Next turn gain [E] and draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:CompressionWave.NAME: Compression Wave
${ModID}:CompressionWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:DarkEmbrace.NAME: Dark Embrace
${ModID}:DarkEmbrace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 1 Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:CursedLance.NAME: Cursed Lance
${ModID}:CursedLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Jinx for every debuff.

${ModID}:SackOfDebris.NAME: Sack Of Debris
${ModID}:SackOfDebris.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each discarded card.

${ModID}:DreadfulFinale.NAME: Dreadful Finale
${ModID}:DreadfulFinale.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with no cards in your hand, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength that turn.

${ModID}:Charge.NAME: Charge
${ModID}:Charge.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, your next attack deals !M! additional damage per unspent [E] .

${ModID}:ManaBurst.NAME: Mana Burst
${ModID}:ManaBurst.DESCRIPTION: The first time you discard a ${ModID}:Sigil each turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:SpiritPressure.NAME: Spirit Pressure
${ModID}:SpiritPressure.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Flare.NAME: Flare
${ModID}:Flare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block per debuff amongst ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Bane.NAME: Bane
${ModID}:Bane.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Jinx is !C!X times more effective on the enemy.
${ModID}:Bane.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Jinx is !C!X + !M! times more effective on the enemy.

${ModID}:SonicReverberation.NAME: Sonic Reverberation
${ModID}:SonicReverberation.DESCRIPTION: Apply !ScourgeString! Vulnerable. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard 1 card.
${ModID}:SonicReverberation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !ScourgeString! Vulnerable. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card.

${ModID}:Stoneskin.NAME: Stoneskin
${ModID}:Stoneskin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Take !M! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:HideInSleeve.NAME: Hide In Sleeve
${ModID}:HideInSleeve.DESCRIPTION: Add a random ${ModID}:Sigil to your hand. NL Discard it.

${ModID}:SoulIgnition.NAME: Soul Ignition
${ModID}:SoulIgnition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only target an enemy with at least !M! debuffs.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Enemy does not have enough debuffs.

${ModID}:SplitResonance.NAME: Split Resonance
${ModID}:SplitResonance.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Resonant attacks deal damage !M! more time. NL Damage is split evenly between hits.
${ModID}:SplitResonance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Resonant attacks deal damage !M! more time. NL Damage is split evenly between hits. NL Gain !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Resonance.

${ModID}:Waterfall.NAME: Waterfall
${ModID}:Waterfall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy takes double damage from ${ModID}:Frostbite.

${ModID}:Shapeshift.NAME: Shapeshift
${ModID}:Shapeshift.DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, gain *Injury. NL Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexteriy.

${ModID}:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
${ModID}:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Crushed affects this card !M! times.

${ModID}:ShockwaveSigils.NAME: Shockwave Sigils
${ModID}:ShockwaveSigils.DESCRIPTION: Discarding a ${ModID}:Sigil applies !M! ${ModID}:Crushed to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:EldritchStaff.NAME: Eldritch Staff
${ModID}:EldritchStaff.DESCRIPTION: {@@} [${ModID}:DarkIcon] attacks grant {!M!|1=twice |@=!M! times} as much Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:SadisticGlee.NAME: Sadistic Glee
${ModID}:SadisticGlee.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy.

${ModID}:Madness.NAME: Madness
${ModID}:Madness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Enemy enters Wrath. NL Whenever an enemy dies, return this to your hand.

${ModID}:SummonMonster.NAME: Summon Monsters
${ModID}:SummonMonster.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Channel a !M! damage Panda. NL Pandas deal damage at the start of your turn.

${ModID}:GolemForm.NAME: Golem Form
${ModID}:GolemForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:M2! Block at the end of your turn. NL Take !M! less damage.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! cards and discard !M! cards.

${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.NAME: Malicious Dagger
${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Curse in your deck.

${ModID}:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
${ModID}:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card is drawn, gain !M! Vulnerable and deal 50% more damage for one turn.

${ModID}:Greed.NAME: Greed
${ModID}:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card is drawn, gain !M! Gold and 1 Weak.
${ModID}:Greed.FLAVOR: Hunting for treasure in the middle of battle is one of the most foolish things I have ever seen.

${ModID}:Hallucination.NAME: Hallucination
${ModID}:Hallucination.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever this card is drawn, randomize the cost of all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:BadLuck.NAME: Bad Luck
${ModID}:BadLuck.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card is drawn, discard the highest cost card in your hand.

${ModID}:NullElement.NAME: Null Element
${ModID}:NullElement.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever this card is drawn, lose [E] .
